channel.title: Jazz Night In America: The Radio Program (Full Archive)
channel.description: Scraped archive of NPR's Jazz Night In America radio episodes, with direct MP3 enclosures, formatted for Zune.

image.title: Jazz Night In America: The Radio Program (Full Archive)

item.title: Have a Blue (Note) Christmas with Don Was
item.description: Don Was digs into the Blue Note Records vault for a different kind of Christmas playlist, bringing together rare cuts, classics and deep grooves from across the label's history. Have a Blue (Note) Christmas with Don Was - UNEDITED Listen· 56:1756-Minute ListenPlaylist Toggle more options Download Embed Embed

item.title: Three is not a crowd: Béla Fleck, Edmar Castañeda and Antonio Sánchez are BEATrio
item.description: Banjo, harp and drums meet in the BEATrio, where Béla Fleck, Edmar Castañeda and Antonio Sánchez explore a sound they never planned to create. Hear how the trio first came together. Jazz Night: BEATrio Listen· 55:5855-Minute ListenPlaylist Toggle more options Download Embed Embed

item.title: Saxophonist Nicole Glover had to face herself to find her sound
item.description: Glover fought to build a life in music. From Portland, Ore., to New York City, her story traces resilience, creativity and the strength she found through sincerity. Nicole Glover - Headline tbd Listen· 58:4358-Minute ListenPlaylist Toggle more options Download Embed Embed

item.title: The beat goes on: Marcus Gilmore steps forward at the Vanguard
item.description: Drummer Marcus Gilmore joins Christian McBride to celebrate his Vanguard debut and reflect on the legacy of his grandfather, Roy Haynes, while carving his own path with Journey to the New. JNIA Marcus Gilmore Ep Listen· 54:5354-Minute ListenPlaylist Toggle more options Download Embed Embed

item.title: Remembering Sheila Jordan, a voice that defined bebop's spirit
item.description: Among the last beboppers, one of the first singers on Blue Note and a pioneer of voice and bass, Sheila Jordan left an indelible mark on jazz. In this conversation from 2023, she joined Christian McBride to reflect on her remarkable life and music. JNIA Shelia Jordan update Listen· 57:5557-Minute ListenPlaylist Toggle more options Download Embed Embed

item.title: How pianist Fred Hersch's daring collaborations shaped his career
item.description: As he nears 70, pianist Fred Hersch looks back on a fearless life in jazz, sharing personal favorites, stories behind bold collaborations and music from his new album. How pianist Fred Hersch’s daring collaborations shaped his career Listen· 59:0059-Minute ListenPlaylist Toggle more options Download Embed Embed

item.title: Jazz House Kids is rewriting the rules of jazz education
item.description: Jazz House Kids trains the next generation of jazz stars — alums include Isaiah J. Thompson and Immanuel Wilkins — and gives every young musician a place to belong. Jazz House Kids TBD Listen· 56:0756-Minute ListenPlaylist Toggle more options Download Embed Embed

item.title: 10 tracks, 10 bands: A wild ride through Hiromi's music
item.description: Pianist Hiromi picks a track from 10 different bands she's led or joined, tracing the bold ideas and unexpected turns that have shaped her ever-evolving sound. Jazz Night Hiromi Listen· 1:01:091-Hour, 1-Minute ListenPlaylist Toggle more options Download Embed Embed

item.title: Remembering Andy Bey: A love letter to a jazz legend
item.description: A master of vocal jazz, Andy Bey left behind a singular legacy. This tribute revisits his life, music and a rare, reflective interview recorded near his 80th birthday. Andy Bey: A Love Letter To A Jazz Legend Listen· 1:00:211-Hour ListenPlaylist Toggle more options Download Embed Embed

item.title: Gather around 'The Yule Log' with pianist George Burton
item.description: On this special holiday episode, we gather around the fire for a special listen to pianist George Burton's burning Christmas record, The Yule Log. We'll hear some favorites and some deep, deep Christmas cuts. Gather around the ‘Yule Log’ with pianist George Burton Listen· 56:0656-Minute ListenPlaylist Toggle more options Download Embed Embed
